mapper.update: insert into place (place_name, place_addr, place_opentime, place_endtime, place_tel, place_content,place_category, place_longitude, place_latitude) values (#{place_name}, #{place_addr}, #{place_opentime}, #{place_endtime}, #{place_tel}, #{place_content}, #{place_category}, #{place_longitude}, #{place_latitude})
update place set place_viewcnt=place_viewcnt+1 where place_idx=#{val}
